name: Nightman

#label_about_the_series

Live-action series based on a superhero character from the Marvel Comics series. Set in the 21st century, Johnny Domino, a jazz saxophone player headlining the House of Soul nightclub, after being struck by lightning, is suddenly able to "tune in" other people's evil thoughts and teams with engineer Raleigh Jordon to become Night Man, utilizing state-of-the-art weaponry to battle sinister forces threatening Bay City.

short_description: Jazz musician Johnny Domino gains super powers after a freak accident with lightning. Now able to telepathically sense evil intentions and suffering insomnia, Johnny becomes Night Man, superhero of Bay City.
